textBeforeTable: [Show Hours] 10:00 - 7:00 The library is open today from Hours All material on loan is subject to recall by the lending library. Interloan items must be returned on time. Requests for renewal must be made 3 days prior to the due date. If an item is lost or damaged while in your possession you will be liable for any replacement charges imposed by the lending library. By requesting an item via interlibrary loan, you are agreeing to the following conditions: It is often difficult to borrow recently published books on interlibrary loan because they are in demand at the libraries owning them. You may wish to suggest the purchase of such materials for the Petoskey District Library collection. Recently published books Petoskey District Library is bound by any restriction on use imposed by the owning library. The borrower should not let others use the books s/he secures on loan unless special arrangements have been made. Restrictions on use The loan period is set by the owning library and is indicated on the cover of the book.
